document.full_text: a great-grandmother selling do-it-yourself asphyxiation kits by mail said on thursday she was ordered from her house at gunpoint by federal agents who raided her home and seized cartons of documents, computers and sewing machines.
document.title: fbi raids home of suicide kit maker in california
lines_and_colors: a great-grandmother selling do-it-yourself asphyxiation kits by mail said on thursday she was ordered from her house at gunpoint by federal agents who raided her home and seized cartons of documents, computers and sewing machines.
